thread.section_title: Ingram's Water & Air Equipment Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ingram's Water & Air Equipment | ingramswaterandair.com
thread.title: Derel Boggs
thread.title_full: Ingram's Water & Air Equipment reviewed by Derel Boggs

author: Derel Boggs
title: Derel Boggs
text: After receiving several Quote: s from local HVAC dealers to replace my entire system at outrageous prices, I decided to purchase a complete AC/Heater system and install it myself. I looked online, found many companies to choose from for this purchase and decided to go with Ingram's. One call and my new system arrived as promised. I haven't had time to install it, however, I was promised that should I need to call for assistance it would not be an issue and they would be more than glad to help.
